settings.stt.vadDesc: Filter out background noise before transcription

settings.polish.reasoningDesc: Allow the model to think step-by-step before responding (slower)
settings.polish.noRules: No rules yet. Add a rule to customize prompts per app or website.
settings.polish.rulePromptPlaceholder: e.g. Format as email with greeting and sign-off. Use professional tone.
settings.polish.rulePromptHint: These instructions are appended to the base prompt when this rule matches.
promptRules.title: Prompt Rules
promptRules.desc: Rules are matched by the frontmost app — the first matching rule's instructions are appended to the base prompt.
promptRules.voiceTipMain: Press {hotkey} to describe your rule by voice.
promptRules.voiceTipExample: e.g. “I want to add a rule for LINE — use a casual, friendly tone with emoji.”
promptRules.voiceRecHint: Speak now — press {hotkey} again to finish.
promptRules.basePromptDesc: Universal STT processing rules, automatically applied to all transcriptions
settings.danger.resetDesc: Restore all settings to their original values
settings.danger.rerunSetupDesc: Show the first-launch setup overlay again
confirm.resetMessage: This will restore all settings to their original values. This cannot be undone.
dictionary.title: Custom Dictionary
dictionary.desc: Add proper nouns, names, or domain-specific terms. The AI will automatically use the correct form when it encounters similar-sounding words.
dictionary.toggleDesc: Inject dictionary terms into the AI polishing prompt
dictionary.emptyHint: Add terms to help the AI recognize proper nouns and names.
history.title: History
history.privacyNote: Your data stays private — all history is stored locally on this device only.
history.retentionDesc: How long to keep history entries
history.storageLocDesc: Where history and audio files are saved
history.clearAllDesc: Permanently delete all history entries and audio files
history.clearAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all history and audio files? This action cannot be undone.
about.title: About
about.desc: Your voice, in writing. AI-powered speech-to-text — press a hotkey to record, transcribe, and paste at your cursor.
about.gatekeeperNote: After restarting, macOS may ask you to allow the app again in System Settings › Privacy & Security.
setup.permissionsDesc: Sumi needs these permissions to record audio and paste text at your cursor.
setup.permAccDesc: Paste text at your cursor with {pasteShortcut}
setup.completeDesc: Speech recognition model downloaded successfully. You can start using Sumi now.
setup.llmPromptDesc: AI Polishing uses a local LLM (~4.6 GB) to refine your transcriptions — fixing grammar, removing fillers, and improving clarity. Fully offline.
setup.polishLocalDesc: Fully offline, ~4.6 GB download. Your data never leaves this device.
setup.polishCloudDesc: Faster, but text is sent to an external server. Requires an API key.
setup.sttChoiceDesc: Choose how Sumi transcribes your voice.
setup.sttLocalDesc:
Fully offline, ~{size} download. Your audio never leaves this device.
You can change the model later in Settings.
setup.sttCloudDesc: Faster, less resource-intensive. Audio is sent to an external server.
test.step1.title: Test your microphone
test.step1.subtitle: Speak normally to see if it’s working.
test.step1.question: Do you see the blue bars moving?
test.step2.title: Test your hotkey
test.step2.subtitle: Press {hotkey} to verify it works.
test.step2.question: Do the keys turn blue when pressed?
test.step3.title: General dictation
test.step3.instruction: Click the text area, press {hotkey} to start, speak, then press {hotkey} again to stop
test.step3.sampleText: Remind me to buy milk and eggs on the way home today.
test.step4.title: Try it in Gmail!
test.step4.instruction: Click the email body, press {hotkey} to start, speak, then press {hotkey} again to stop
test.step4.sampleText: Try saying: “嗨 Alice，我們明天還是照原計劃吃午餐嗎？Alan”
test.step5.title: AI Polishing
test.step5.subtitle: Edit by Voice uses AI to apply your spoken instructions to selected text.
test.step5.polishNotReady: AI polishing is not configured yet. Enable it in Settings to use Edit by Voice.
test.step5.polishReady: AI polishing is configured. You can now test Edit by Voice.
test.step6.title: Edit by Voice
test.step6.instruction: Select all text, press {hotkey} to start, speak your editing instruction, then press {hotkey} again to apply
test.step6.sampleText: Try saying: “Translate to English” or “Make it more formal”
test.step6.prefill: Hi Alice, are we still on for lunch tomorrow? Let me know if that works for you. Thanks, Alan
stats.heroSubtitleAfter: to dictate, press again to paste.
